getClaimProof(uint256).details: Retrieve Claim inclusion or non-inclusion proof for a given claim index.

returns._0: The ClaimsTree inclusion or non-inclusion proof for the claim

getClaimProofByRoot(uint256,uint256).details: Retrieve Claim inclusion or non-inclusion proof for a given claim index by target root.

returns._0: The ClaimsTree inclusion or non-inclusion proof for the claim

getLatestPublishedClaimsRoot().details: returns latest published claims tree root

getLatestPublishedRevocationsRoot().details: returns latest published revocation tree root

getLatestPublishedRootsRoot().details: returns latest published roots tree root

getRevocationProof(uint64).details: Retrieve inclusion or non-inclusion proof for a given revocation nonce.

returns._0: The RevocationsTree inclusion or non-inclusion proof for the revocation nonce

getRevocationProofByRoot(uint64,uint256).details: Retrieve inclusion or non-inclusion proof for a given revocation nonce by target root.

returns._0: The RevocationsTree inclusion or non-inclusion proof for the revocation nonce

getRevocationStatus(uint256,uint64).details: returns revocation status of a claim using given revocation nonce

getRevocationStatusByIdAndState(uint256,.details: returns revocation status of a claim using given revocation nonce, id and state

getRootProof(uint256).details: Retrieve inclusion or non-inclusion proof for a given claimsTreeRoot.

returns._0: The RootsTree inclusion or non-inclusion proof for the claim tree root

getRootProofByRoot(uint256,uint256).details: Retrieve inclusion or non-inclusion proof for a given claimsTreeRoot by target root.

returns._0: The RootsTree inclusion or non-inclusion proof for the claim tree root

getRootsByState(uint256).details: returns historical claimsTree roots, revocationsTree roots, rootsTree roots by state
